title: Polish President pays a visit to Latvia
summary_full: Polish President Karol Nawrocki is in Latvia on a working visit on December 11th, where he will be welcomed Thursday morning at Riga Castle by President Edgars Rinkēvičs.
summary_public: Polish President Karol Nawrocki is in Latvia on a working visit on December 11th, where he will be welcomed Thursday morning at Riga Castle by President Edgars Rinkēvičs.
